text: Rakesh Kumar, Director (Finance) Neyveli Lignite Corporation, being conferred the Outstanding CFO Award by Lt. Gen. Krishna Mohan Seth, (Retd), former governor of Madhya Pradesh, at the 17th Management Summit in New Delhi on Friday. The award is instituted by Top Rankers, management consultants, in collaboration with Sharada University, New Delhi.— Photo: Special Arrangement
title: Outstanding CFO Award
